content.text: Darepp was a planet in the Colonies, near Atzerri. It was located at the Foless Crossroads. After reappearing near Arat Fraca, the Star Morning docked at Darepp. The Morning then visited a number of colony worlds, including 23 Mere, Babbadod, Fwiis, New Polokia, and Yisgga, before returning to Motexx.
